mapper.select: select resno, resname, resadress, format(resgrade,1) resgrade, userid, resnation, resstate, date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') writedate from restaurant_table order by resno desc

select resno, resname, resadress, format(resgrade,1) resgrade, userid, resnation, resstate, date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') writedate from restaurant_table
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by resno desc

select resno, resname, resadress, reshour, reshourend, format(resgrade,1) resgrade, userid, resnation, resstate, date_format(writedate,'%Y-%m-%d') writedate from restaurant_table where userid = #{param1} order by resno asc
select resno from restaurant_table where resno=(select max(resno) from restaurant_table);
select resimg from restaurant_table where resno=#{param1}
